entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 10:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: E 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 22 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 22 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
